ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Waki or Yaki... Was Claw Hype
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with Sartori.  I have seen: LOADING, Please Wait... far too many times.  Sometimes less is more - really it is. Sylly ... From: jay schultze
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with Sartori. I have seen: LOADING, Please Wait... far too many
times. Sometimes "less is more" - really it is.

Sylly


----- Original Message -----
From: jay schultze <sartori69@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, April 01, 2000 10:42 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Waki or Yaki... Was Claw Hype


I will always believe that is in
> *MY* best interest to not use Yaks because most of my time is spent on
large
> raids where I want as little attention to myself as possible. I have seen
> log analyes but have not performed any tests myself. I have seen both
> weapons compared endlessly with this person or that person comparing logs
> and analyzing with different formulas. I've seen tests where the yak beat
> out the wak, and I've seen tests where Waks beat out Yak with procs.
